statements: DELETE FROM EdTechData WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 101;
DELETE FROM EdTechData WHERE completion_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM Courses WHERE instructor LIKE 'Smith';
DELETE FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 100 AND total_students < 10;
DELETE FROM students WHERE age > 25 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM Enrollments WHERE student_id = 101 AND course_id = 201;
DELETE FROM Assessments WHERE assessment_type = 'Final Exam';
